channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023120493
item.description:
Report X-2023120493

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Screened shipment via XRAY, saw bullets on the screen in a piece of luggage. Physical search revealed 10 rounds of ammunition.

item.title: Report X-2023120212
item.description:
Report X-2023120212

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023120212, X-2023120213, X-2023120214: It was noticed a translucent inbound tote with an interior small box showing the letters "rosol". Suspecting aerosols, the tote was xrayed, Aeorosol confirmed. The rest of the shipment was put through xray. Following DG found in multiple plastic totes, not visible from the outside. Originally screened by K9. Items had flown twice on passenger aircraft 25OCT/RDMSEA/AS913 27OCT/SEAANC/AS93 6 aerosol cans 3 Lithium Metal Batteries 4 Lithium Ion Batteries contained in equipment
